title: Xbox Remote Controller App

description.text: Missing controllers at a local lan party? Don't worry, we got you covered

bulletPoints: Your Android device can act as an Xbox controller
Supports multiplayer, up to 4 players, useful for when you're short on controllers
Support multiple layouts for different games, e.g., gyroscope layout for driving games
Supports Unity games and every game that supports Xbox controller
Works alongside different controllers (e.g. Xbox controller) and mouse and keyboard
